title: Company
description:
AhnLab Blockchain Company, a subsidiary of AhnLab, researches blockchain security technology to 
protect assets and IP in the web3 world. We ensure users of all ages and cultures enjoy a safe, 
convenient web3 experience. We develop and support infrastructure for organizations 
to adopt blockchain wallets and expand their web3 presence.
